snippet: George Najjar, the head coach at Sayreville War Memorial High School in North Jersey, led the team for 20 years, but allegations of hazing and sexual assault have upended the program.
abstract: George Najjar, head football coach at Sayreville War Memorial High School in New Jersey, is fired following locker-room hazing and sexual abuse scandal that brought national attention and led to charges being pressed against seven football players.
lead_paragraph: George Najjar, the head coach at Sayreville War Memorial High School in North Jersey, led the team for 20 years, but allegations of hazing and sexual assault have upended the program.

headline.main: Sayreville Football Coach Is Ousted After Scandal
headline.print_headline: Sayreville Football Coach Is Ousted After Scandal
